snippet.title: Plushie Defense | Opening - Available now on Google Play and App Store!
snippet.description:
Gather your Plushie friends to defend against the Claw Machine!

Plushie Defense is a puzzle/tower-defense game where your plushie friends need your help to defend from the evil Claw Machine!

Unlike most tower-defense games, the Claw’s path is not linear, and it will maneuver around the placement of your units. Unlock new plushies which have unique abilities, and beat levels with smart placements and team combinations!
